column2: Leucadia to give FXCM $300 million to continue operations Leucadia National Corp  will give $300 million to retail foreign exchange broker FXCM Inc  to meet regulatory capital requirements
column3: the two companies said on Friday.

column2: UPDATE 2-PepsiCo elects Trian adviser to board
column3: signaling truce Jan 16 PepsiCo Inc said it had elected an adviser at Nelson Peltz's Trian Fund Management to its board
column4: signaling a truce between the company and the activist investor following his two- year push to split the snack and beverage maker.
